title: Clear night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A white van drives down a city street at night with multiple braking events.

description: The white van is driving down a city street at night. There are several other cars on the road, including a parked truck on the right side of the street. The road is well-lit with streetlights and traffic lights. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle, a white van, is driving down the city street at night. It slows down and brakes frequently, possibly due to the presence of other vehicles or pedestrians. The van maintains a safe distance from the vehicles ahead and adjusts its speed accordingly. The driver of the van is cautious and attentive, scanning the road for any potential hazards.
